en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 assault rifle (FDE)
en.description: The XM8 is a lightweight assualt rifle system developed in the 1990's by Heckler & Koch as a replacement for the M4. While it would ultimately not be accepted, the XM8 is a reliable, light, and modular weapon. How it came to Tarkov is unknown, but it is a welcome addition.

en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 assault rifle (OD)
en.description: The XM8 is a lightweight assualt rifle system developed in the 1990's by Heckler & Koch as a replacement for the M4. While it would ultimately not be accepted, the XM8 is a reliable, light, and modular weapon. How it came to Tarkov is unknown, but it is a welcome addition.

en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 assault rifle (Black)
en.description: The XM8 is a lightweight assualt rifle system developed in the 1990's by Heckler & Koch as a replacement for the M4. While it would ultimately not be accepted, the XM8 is a reliable, light, and modular weapon. How it came to Tarkov is unknown, but it is a welcome addition.

en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 LMG length barrel
en.description: A custom barrel for the XM8 made from a G36 barrel. A longer, heavier barrel designed for to withstand the heat of sustained automatic fire, or a higher level of accuracy and distance over smaller courses of fire.

en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 rifle length Barrel
en.description: A custom barrel for the XM8 made from a G36 barrel. A standard, rifle length barrel built for multiple roles.

en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 carbine length barrel
en.description: A custom barrel for the XM8 made from a G36 barrel. A shorter, carbine length barrel that meets the middle ground for all tactical scenarios.

en.name: HK XM8 5.56x45 PDW length barrel
en.description: A custom barrel for the XM8 made from a G36 barrel. A compact and stubby barrel designed for CQB and other confined spaces.

en.name: HK XM8 gas block
en.description: An adjusted G36 Gas Block designed for use on the adapted G36 barrels being used for the XM8 platform in Tarkov.

en.name: HK XM8 LMG handguard
en.description: An AR length handguard equipped with a bipod for better prone performance and stable shooting.

en.name: HK XM8 rifle length handguard
en.description: A full length XM8 handguard.

en.name: HK XM8 carbine length handguard
en.description: A carbine length handguard for the XM8 rifle.

en.name: HK XM8 PDW handguard
en.description: A compact handguard for the XM8, designed to minimize length and weight for close in operations.

en.name: HK XM8 Adjustable Stock
en.description: An adjustable stock for the XM8 rifle.

en.name: HK XM8 Stock Cap
en.description: A PDW style buttcap syle stock for the XM8, to be used in close in scenarions.

en.name: HK XM8 folding stock adapter
en.description: Adapter to allow the installation of a folding stock to the XM8.

en.name: HK XM8 folding stock
en.description: Folding stock for the XM8.

en.name: HK XM8 picatinny top rail
en.description: A picatinny topped rail for the XM8 system. Allows a wide variety of optics and tactical attachments.

en.name: HK XM8 flat top rail
en.description: A traditional, flat top XM8 rail, with a small, rear picatinny rail for mounting optics.

en.name: HK XM8 AR/LMG PCAP-picatinny adapter
en.description: An adapter to convert the XM8's propriteray PCAP system to accept picatinny based attachments, for use on the AR and LMG handguards.

en.name: HK XM8 Carbine PCAP-picatinny adapter
en.description: An adapter to convert the XM8's propriteray PCAP system to accept picatinny based attachments, for use with the Carbine handguard.

en.name: HK XM8 PDW PCAP-picatinny adapter
en.description: An adapter to convert the XM8's propriteray PCAP system to accept picatinny based attachments, for use with the PDW handguard.
